00028     : simulationPtr_(&simulation)

00031    /* 
00032    * Return a pointer to an instance of Diagnostic subclass className.
00033    */
00034    Diagnostic* DiagnosticFactory::factory(const std::string &className) const
00035    {
00036       Diagnostic* ptr = 0;
00037 
00038       // Try subfactories first (if any)
00039       //ptr = trySubfactories(className);
00040       //if (ptr) return ptr;
00041 
00042       // Simulation Diagnostics
00043       if (className == "WriteConfig") {
00044          ptr = new WriteConfig(simulation());
00045       } else 
00046       if (className == "OutputEnergy") {
00047          ptr = new OutputEnergy(simulation());
00048       }
00049       return ptr;
00050    }
00051 
00052 }
00053 #endif
